net.sf.sprockets.util.concurrent

Interface ResultCallback<V>


  • public interface ResultCallback<V>
    Modelled after Guava's FutureCallback, but also includes a result in onFailure that provides the context of the failure.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onFailure(V result, Throwable t)
      The operation has failed and provides some form of result along with the cause of the failure.
      void onSuccess(V result)
      The operation has completed successfully and provides a result.

    • Method Detail

      • onSuccess

        void onSuccess(V result)
        The operation has completed successfully and provides a result.

      • onFailure

        void onFailure(V result,
             Throwable t)
        The operation has failed and provides some form of result along with the cause of the failure.
